title: ebook: how to choose right font for your design?
content:
Hi everyone,

I've downloaded small ebook (around 15 pages) and I cant remember it's name , and of course, I deleted it from my computer few months ago (and recycle bin also)!  
So if anyone knows where can I download that ebook, or has got it...i would be thankful!

I dont remember the exact name...but it was something like name of this thread..  
And one of the first pages was about choosing the right type for fat trunk tree logo or smth like that..

Thanks

Ivan
author: djipster

comments.content:
Finally,

I've found it!  
Thanx anyway!

mind mentioning the book name ? :)

M
Also, anyone know where I left my keys?
They'll be in the last place you look for them, Darrell.
Then only look in one more place ;)
